attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the select

attributes.name: name
attributes.title: Name
attributes.description: This element's value will be surfaced during form submission under the provided name

slots.name: button-container
slots.title: Button container slot
slots.description: Slot to replace the entire invoking element and its contents

slots.name: selected-value
slots.title: Selected value slot
slots.description: Slot to replace the displayed value contents

slots.name: indicator
slots.title: Indicator slot
slots.description: Slot to provide a custom icon to represent the visual indicator

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the button container

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the button container and after the indicator
